meanings.sent1: The curtain looked sashless without its colorful sash.
meanings.sent2: The window appeared sashless without its elegant sashes.
meanings.sent3: The party banner felt sashless without its festive sash.
meanings.sent4: The tree seemed sashless without its autumn sashes.
meanings.sent5: The outfit felt incomplete and sashless without its matching sash.
